case.state: We haven't started yet! Is this some sort of mind game? Why are you already exposed?
You're taking the fun out of the game! Now there's no mystery or tension to it. This was supposed to be fun.
Whoa! Has the game started already? Am I late?
You remind me of my friend Bow. Though it's probably just the abs on display.
Hello, I'm Adora. Is this seat open?
So, this is where the poker match is happening? I'm SO ready for some competition!
This place is safe from the Horde, right? Finally, a place where I could relax for a bit... as long as they don't show up.
Is... Is that a butterfly talking to me? Alright, I've seen weirder. Deal me in.
WHAT IS THIS PLACE? IS THAT A GHOST? HOW IS THIS SUPPOSED TO BE FUN?
Won't the cards get wet if we play here?
I'd rather not play with wet cards, but... I have a plan if that were to happen.
I'm not backing down just because someone is watching me. It's not a problem if I win.
Oh, okay. I get it. This is so ironic. But it's okay! Bring it on! I'm ready for your claws or whatever!

Wait, you're all like...
Did someone set up this table on purpose...? Never mind, I'll just play along, I guess.
I've never let her stop me before, and I'm not to let a bunch of people like her stop me now.
I think we're a bit short. Isn't this a five-person game?
An all-female game? Count me in!
Alright, time for some relaxation.
Name's Adora, and I'm feeling good! I've prepared for any and all possible scenarios. I am so ready for this Poker thing!
This case is supposed to be hidden! How did you find it?
Give me ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
There is a method to this, I just have to figure it out.
That clearly isn't going to work. Letâ€™s try this again.
Should I keep this one? I mean, it's so close to a straight but...
Remember the chart. Going for pairs is better than straights, however...
Please don't make me regret this...
I should aim for pairs. Going straight is never an option!
One card, please.
I'll take two new cards.
Give me three.
I need four cards. Hopefully, something to help this high card.
Give me a new hand!
Nothing for me! This hand is perfect!
Looks like I just needed a warm-up.
Ah, I can taste victory now.
That's a strong way to start the game.
Looks like I'm on my way to an early lead.
Don't feel too bad if I beat you, it's still early in the game.
Wow! These are pretty good cards. Alright, let's see what you got!
How do you wash a deck of cards? I think the Inventory has to after each game. I hope they do.
Horde Cards replaced all the kings, queens, and jacks. They had generals, captains, and Sargent. There are no cool pictures though.
This'll be a piece of cake.
Glimmer's right! I have gotten really good at improvising!
Yes!... I mean, oh no! I have such a terrible hand...
I knew advanced prep would be the key to success!
Everyone is more talkative than I was expecting.
I didn't think poker would be this...social.
The stakes are still low. No need to stress about luck, yet.
I can work with what I got. It's one of my many talents.
I'm not familiar with this type of poker. I studied Brightmoon hold'em for this game.
Can no one tell Glimmer this is where I went tonight? She'd totally make fun of me for it.
On one hand, losing means that these guys won't have to lose. But on the other... I don't want to lose either!
Alright Adora, keep it cool. You can win with these cards. All you have to do is beat a single opponent!
Okay, I need to relax... Is there something I can hit? Maybe someone to spar with?
Think carefully before you swap. It's going to be a close round
This is the best type of hand: good, but still bad enough to be risky!
Maybe I'm getting too comfortable around everyone.
Wait! That was the wrong card!
Too bad my sword can't heal back luck... Or can it?
I could really use Bow's words of encouragement right now...
The legends say She-Ra can heal the forests and bring back life... I wonder if my powers can affect my luck with the cards.
Wait! I have a plan for this! It's... W-where is my plan?!
This isn't a great warm-up hand.
How can everyone talk, and play poker? I can hardly think right now.
I got distracted. I can't focus if everyone is talking.
Ohhhhh no. That was a bad swap.
That was not my best move.
I went for greatness and I came up short. Story of my life.
I haven't technically bet anything yet. I could just sit this round out and go to the bathroom, right?
Here's a tip ~human~. Don't do what I just did.
It's okay! Really! I have everything under control!
Why do my plans always fall apart? Always! Itâ€™d be impressive if it wasn't terrifying!
I-I'm not used to playing with actual ghosts... I'll do my best to keep calm! I know you don't mean any harm!
Are we playing with actual ghosts!? I don't have a plan for that! I need to improvise something!
Oh, I'll pretend I didn't see that.
Try hiding it in the toe of your boot next time. Just as a- uhhhh, random example.
Come on Fate. Can't you be nice for like, a minute?
This story is already sounding familiar.
It's like a mini princess gem! That's so cool! Can I try one?
You know what Emi? You're on! I love a good challenge.
Oh, Dawn... Should I go talk to her? I'm not good at talking through someone's feelings, but I can try.
Wait, princesses don't just get naked? I've got some more to learn, I guess.
I've worked pretty hard to get muscles like these! They might not be as appealing as Nami's breasts, but I'm proud of how I look.
It all comes down to this! Thanks for playing with me ~human~, but you're going down!
... Something is off about Tharja. I don't know why, but she really reminds me of... someone from the Horde.
My sword kinda feels...sticky. I never questioned the magic until now; it feels super weird on my skin.
It's just you and me ~opponent~. Do your best, and may the best strip poker player win.
The early rounds are less interesting.
Every bit of clothing counts. You have to treat every round as a make-or-break situation. Even if it's boring this early.
You can take your time, but it's a little early to be stalling.
It's too early to say if someone is winning yet. Let's keep going.
Can an ace connect to a two for a straight? It counts as a one, right?
Maybe the other princesses would like to come here too... But not Frosta. Oh, definitely not Frosta.

This place has a really calm atmosphere... Even Mermista could chill here...
No, wait, what am I saying, she'd probably be like "Uuuugh, stripping in front of strangers? I already have Sea Hawk if I want to embarrass myself..."
You know who'd love this place? Perfuma! She's all about this relaxed, friendly vibe... And the stripping, the games, the... Self-touching...
- So, uh... Are we gonna talk about our feelings after this, or are we gonna make fun of the losers? Just so I know whether this is a Bright Moon or a Fright Zone kind of party...
We never had parties back in the Horde... But we did have small, secret meetings to play card games. So this makes me feel nostalgic.
I'm keeping my sword by the way. Whenever someone else had it things went terribly wrong.
Does anyone like She-Ra here? I hear she's pretty cool.
Win or lose, just try to enjoy it.
Are you guys doing anything after the game? Do you want to hang out?
So, Jim... I heard you've got a lot of experience dealing with giant bugs. Is that true?
Look at the muscles on you, Jim. Do you wanna arm wrestle later? I'm always down for picking opponents twice my size.
You really nailed the "rebellion leader" look, Jim. I don't look like a rebel at all, though that's probably because I used to work for our evil empire before...
I really needed this break, to be honest. It's just hard to ask for time off when there's so much counting on me.
Come on Adora! Get your head in the game!
I made a bad swap; it happens. I won't sweat the details.
It's more fun if there is a close game. I was told to have some fun after all.
How about I be fair and take four things off?
Fine, you earned another layer.
It's more fun if it's a close game. Beat me again next round to make it more exciting.
Good round! I think it'll be more fun if we're all undressed.
It's only fair, I'm staring at topless people right now.
Is this going to bring us to sudden death? That's so exciting!
My first loss isn't anything to worry about. I wasn't expecting to be flawless in a game of chance.
My last defense. Now it's win or lose. It's pretty exciting!
Let's spice up this game a little.
I know what I did wrong. I'll do better next round.
Me? Well, I was hoping to show off, just a little.
These leggings cover too much of my abs. I worked hard to have these muscles. I got to show them off!
I'll take my bra off. It's unfashionable anyway.
I might be losing, but I still don't feel very worried. Maybe I should take off more?
I don't like the pattern I'm seeing. I'm losing a lot of games.
This is getting bad. This is getting kind of fun!
This looks like I'm on my last legs. I got to make a comeback!
I have to show something important, before everyone else. The embarrassment might help me play better.
My last defense has to go. I still have one more round in me, I can turn this around. I hope.
Last time I needed a break my friends couldn't figure out how to help me relax. So now, I get to do my own thing.
Being She-Ra has so much responsibility. I have to fight battles, plan attacks, and live up to some legendary heroes. It's a lot.
My belts are keeping me from all my good stuff. It's just how the game goes.
It's two boots and two socks. I just don't want to ruin the socks, plus they're pretty boring for this game.
This jacket has been with me ever since I started my adventure. It's the best jacket a girl could have.
You beat me enough times to earn a little skin. I hope you like muscles.
I hope you all will focus on more than just the abs though.
I never wanted to lose this much. Well, let's see if you can still focus after I take this off!
Why is my heart pounding so hard? I think I'm enjoying this, and not just sexually.
I came here because I used to play poker back in the academy. I love the tension and planning, but enough about me. Back to the game!
Don't get me wrong, being She-Ra has its perks. Big muscles, amazing hair, and the ladies love her.
I still have one loss left. If you want to look at my body instead of your cards, then be my guest.
Alright, next hand! Let's keep this game going.
That's a bit better. Those boots are designed for combat, not comfort.
I'll get my jacket back after this game, right?
I don't have an impressive bra, but it's practical for combat. You can still enjoy it; just don't get distracted.
I don't know what good underwear looks like. I've never been shopping for it. I've never actually been shopping for clothes, huh. Is that weird?
It's so much easier to breathe without my top on. My chest was starting to feel tight.
No losses remaining. You have to focus Adora! Just tune everyone out and think. Alright, bring it on!
You seem to be popular around here. Do you have any advice?
Heh, I bet my sword is better ~name~.
Hey ~name~, you look good for a fight. Can we train together? I haven't had a decent sparring partner for a while.
NO! I'm not doing this today! I hate ghosts! Why would you even haunt me? I didn't kill anyone!
Finally, someone who can actually take war seriously. I know so many soldiers who don't take battle planning seriously. I mean, can you believe that?
Ah, you must go to the academy. I pretended I was a student once. Totally nailed it.
Are you dead? Is that allowed? I mean, I don't know! I hate this kind of stuff!
A prince? I've never actually met one. I know it's technically called "The Princess Alliance", but do you want to join?
Hey! It's only a game. Can you try to be a bit nicer?
You're ruining this poker game with your attitude. Knock it off already.
I should have known a creep would play a game like this.
I've lived in the Fright Zone long enough to know when someone is bad news. You, ~target~, are definitely bad news.
Alright, you lost. Time to strip.
Umm, you have to strip, ~target~.
Hey! I won!
Umm, don't feel nervous stripping in front of a girl. I'm pretty nervous though.
Things are starting to get interesting.
Look at this! I won. You already know what that means, ~target~.
That was a good round! Let's see if the strip is good too.
Well, look who has to strip. You're not going to take something small, right?
You're up, ~target~. Take your time and try to be comfortable.
~Target~ loses? Well, I think we all earned the win.
Another good round of poker! Not for ~target~, but for us.
Did you learn something? I think I'm about to. Get it?
It doesn't matter what you take off as long as you're still happy to be here. I sure am.
I am dominating this game.
I won again? This isn't very tense.
It's ~target~ that has to strip. I think. Am I right?
Boom! I win! Alright ~target~, strip it.
Hey ~target~, did you make a risky swap or just not have anything good?
Someone had to lose the round. The fun part is what ~target~ is going to do next.
That was closer than it looked. I just got lucky with the swap.
There is a lot more small talk in this game of poker than I was prepared for.
You might join me if you keep being reckless like that.
Don't get distracted! You could have stared at my body if you won!
You'll lose the whole game if you keep losing hands.
Do you need a coach? I don't have much else to do.
Awwwww, that's sweet.
Are you ok? Do you need a little break Aoba?
Gate of the what?
Interesting! Let's see what you got!
GET DOWN! SHE'S INSANE!
Could you stop? Someone could get hurt!
You're not going to be able to put your clothes back on! How are you getting home?
So, ~name~, you're cute. Like a kitten! Yea, that's what I uh, meant.
Heh, I bet my sword is better ~name~.
NO! I'm not doing this today! I hate ghosts! Why would you even haunt me? I didn't kill anyone!
Are you dead? Is that allowed? I mean, I don't know! I hate this kind of stuff!
Finally, someone who can actually take war seriously. I know so many soldiers who don't take battle planning seriously. I mean, can you believe that?
Hey ~name~, you look good for a fight. Can we train together? I haven't had a decent sparring partner for a while.
Hey! You're a princess too? That's great! Do you have any advice? I'm terrible at basically everything royal.
I know a few witches. One of them is super evil and the other is incredibly nice to me. Both are, um, eccentric.
Ah, you must go to the academy. I pretended I was a student once. Totally nailed it.
I think we're going to get along. Hi, I'm Adora.
Would it kill you to be polite? It's a game of poker.
I never thought someone could be ruder than Catra, but you've exceeded my expectations.
I'm a big fan of the strong silent type. You came to the right game!
A royal flush! That's amazing!
Look at what I got! No one was beating me.
Well, I'm looking forward to this.
~Name~ lost, so it's time to enjoy the benefits of winning!
The cards decided that you lost ~name~. You know what that means!
Boom! I win again!
I was hoping you'd lose ~name~. Not because I hate you or anything! It's just, I have to play to win.
That was close! I almost had nothing before that swap. That's never a fun spot to be in.
This game isn't as tense as I thought it would be.
Was I this good back in the Horde? I thought I lost a lot.
Why can't I be this lucky all the time?
I'm starting to feel overdressed. Maybe I'll go for a flush next hand.
It's still anyone's game. Just relax.
I think I figured out your tell, ~target~. There's no betting so it doesn't really matter.
Looks like this game is getting interesting.
I won? Well, it's more like ~target~ lost.
Is it rude to stare?
It's just an early game loss. There's no need to panic or celebrate.
I think you underestimated how good my cards were.
It's starting to get more exciting. Every hand counts, so be careful, ~target~.
Remember ~target~, High cards are more likely to be in our hands than in the deck.
Beating people with cards is fun, but this next part is even better.
That was close! Now to the good part.
I think you'll remove something from your top.
I'm rocking this game!
This is going well. Things are starting to get interesting!
Did I distract you? I have that effect on people.
Care to join me?
I can't tell if I want you to win the game or lose quickly. I guess you can be naked either way.
I'm looking forward to this.
Now fight to determine the loser! We don't do that here? That's lame!
Take cover! Was the safety not on this whole time?!
What was that? Does that count?
Hold on, that counts?!
Don't think that taking off something small while I'm naked is cool.
Little by little I'm getting you closer to masturbating.
Be careful, your little items can only save you for so long.
It's not going to save you from defeat.
That's not impressive.
~clothing.ifPlural(Your ~clothing~ are ruining the mood. | Your ~clothing~ is ruining the mood.)~
Now I feel super exposed
I wonder if they make ~clothing~ for penises? That would make this game much more interesting.
Do you know where any cool belt buckles are? My old one was the Horde emblem and all Glimmer had was a wing.
Your boots look pretty sturdy. I like a guy with strong taste in footwear.
It's going to be harder to see the cards without your glasses. Are you sure you can take that chance after a loss ~name~?
Those seem handy. Bow said that pun would be funny.
I don't understand the appeal of hats. It seems like it would always be in the way or go flying off.
Why would you want to listen to music by yourself? Isn't music only made for dancing?
Why do some people wear a necklace when they just want to show off the centerpiece? Can't they just have it on their shirt?
I'm getting closer to beating you.
Trust me, it's the little losses that you think about later.
Let's just move on. I'll beat ~target~ again.
Did you enjoy taking that off? I didn't enjoy watching it.
That seems a bit extreme!
Should we pause the game until Florina returns? Will she be back? Maybe I should check on her.
You're a person! That's a fun transformation! How did you do it?
You can transform too? That's amazing!
Wait, were you going to count that this whole time? That's, umm, okay.
Starting off small to build the tension? Well, a tactical decision can still be boring.
I was expecting something small this early, but it's still boring.
Am I supposed to know why you're wearing ~clothing~? Is this normal?
You seem to know a bit about fashion. Do you offer lessons?
It's not very interesting when all you remove ~clothing.ifPlural(are ~clothing~| is ~clothing~)~.
AHHHHHH! She just died!
That's actually underwhelming, and confusing. Is this a trick to throw everyone off?
Belts are pretty useful. It's the perfect mix of fashion and function.
Won't that make it harder to see everyone else get naked? Did you think that move through?
Heh, guess you could say the gloves are coming off.
Do you think I should wear a hat? I look pretty good in a tiara. Then again, that's when I have She-Ra's hair.
What are those for? They look too clunky to be practical in battle.
That's a cute little necklace. Just be aware that it can be used as a strangling device if you're ever in trouble.
Why would you have a gauntlet that small?
Do your shoes also have a steel toe hidden in them? Glimmer says it's not normal. Pfft, it's totally normal, right?
It's a start. Let's see if you can do better next round.
Are you hiding anything else? I think it's fair to let us know.
Why would that be the proof he needs?
Wasn't there a stripping order rule we had to follow? No? Please hurry up; I'm running out of small talk.
I know three boys. I should probably bump those numbers up.
I don't know much about boys' fashion, or any fashion really.
Do you need us to stop the game? It's not fair if you can't read the cards.
Why? I have no idea why you would do that.
Are shoulder pads still fashionable? It's just that your jacket didn't have them so I'm wondering if I missed something.
Back to the game!
Don't lose twice in a row, ~target~. I'm not going easy on half-naked guys.
Was that it? Alright then.
Just try not to lose again.
I feel like I was really bad at the game now.
Was I eager to lose? It should have been a closer game.
Is that the same bee? Maybe there's a hive nearby.
That's the cutest thing I've ever seen! An adorable animal transformation is the best thing I can think of!
OH, SHE'S DEAD! SHE'S SO DEAD!
Why is your skin rubbing off? Are you ok?
Did you forget about your ~clothing~? I definitely did.
I don't know if I prefer a slow removal or a quick one. Eh, both are good.
You reap what you sew. Get it? Sew? Like clothing? Never mind...
I'll take anything if it means you'll be closer to full nudity.
It has to come off eventually.
WHY ARE YOU NOT DEAD? Ok Adora, calm down. Deep breaths. Remember your stress training.
You can summon it? I wonder if I could get mine to do that? That would be so convenient!
What was that thing? It was like some bug-monster thing!
Wow, that's oddly arousing. I think you're into something and dragging me into it.
I bet you'll agree that jackets are the coolest item someone could wear. Glimmer believes that it's a hood.
Those are some tall socks. You might as well commit to full leggings. Then you'll save money on shorts. It's pretty cost-effective.
Let's get back to it. I want to beat ~target~ again.
Are you ready, ~target~? I don't want to move on until you are.
It's not much, but it will do; for now.
Aw, that's it?
It runs out? That's not very useful.
I was getting into the whole cat costume. It's sad to see it go.
Just act like you're going to take a bath with all of us. Totally less embarrassing.
I'm not into guys, but we can be friends. We got a few things in common already.
At least your ~clothing~ served its purpose.
Make sure to treat those clothes with care and respect. Then your layers might last longer.
Are you nervous yet? Just take a deep breath and only focus on your goal. That's combat advice, but it might work here.
And now we can get back to poker!
She can transform? That's awesome!
That's not proper gun safety!
Did you just turn into a She-Ra? That's amazing!
I respect it. Giving it all you got to win! Alright, let's do this Emi!
I like your determination! Now I want you to win!
Wait, she's just a normal girl? With a normal life?
The less I have to imagine the better!
Is my outfit not right for stripping? My clothes are way different from ~target~'s.
Your ~clothing~ looks great. Even better now that I won it off you.
I liked your ~clothing~ before, but this is much better.
Don't worry about being exposed like this. I'll protect you if something goes wrong.
I can stand guard if you need me to. So relax and undress, I'll take care of you.
Strip easy, nobody will try anything as long as I'm here.
I can do that too you know. I'm pretty much an expert.
There's nothing to be ashamed of. I have plenty of friends who are part animal.
She's hot! Can you put that armor back on too? Can you teach me how?
That's such a cool transformation! With the lights and hair! It was so cool!
Battle scars are nothing to be ashamed of. They're proof you survived something hard. I got a few myself. I think? They're on my back. I can't really see them.
Is she famous or something? I have no idea who she is.
Eh, your secret is safe with me. Everyone already knows I'm She-Ra. It's pretty great having everyone know your alter ego.
Give me a second. ~Target~'s body is taking up all my thinking power.
You look even cuter than you did thirty seconds ago.
Nice~.
Get down! Oh, it ran out of fuel; I think.
Get down!
Shadow magic? What kind of curse do you have on you? Did you kick Shadow Weaver or something?
I've seen Bow's stomach plenty of times. This won't be anything new.
Are you taking your shirt off because you're desperate or because you want to show off?
That is some great muscle definition! How often do you work out?
Those are some impressive muscles, but I still think She-Ra is more impressive
Wanna arm wrestle?
Looking fit! What's your secret? Mine's a magic sword and working out when I'm stressed.
Wanna arm wrestle?
Is there any reason for boys not to have breasts?
You're not looking too shabby, ~target~.
There's nothing to be ashamed of there. Try to relax.
Those are some male nipples. Not my favorite kind, but still good.
If you take your pants off now, why would I care about your other layers? You're taking the tension out of the game!
It's ok Adora. It's just a penis. No need to treat ~target~ any differently.
Is this going to hurt our friendship?
You lose, ~target~. Feeling tense yet?
Can we please deal cards now?
Where have I seen that shape before? Somewhere in the Fright Zone, I think.
That seems like it would be a burden in a fight.
Nice butt.
See? It's not that embarrassing.
She's finally gone! Now I can relax!
I think that bee and I are interested in something similar.
You can transform? That's amazing!
A transformation and cute breasts? It's like my two favorite things in one fun package.
This is the reward I've been waiting for.
A loss for ~target~, and two soft prizes for the rest of us.
I won't judge you, I promise. I'll stare though, like a lot.
I prefer this version to regular poker. ~Target~ is about to show us why.
Those are amazing! You look so cute!
I hope you don't mind me saying, but I think you're really cute.
You can transform into a catgirl? It's my two favorite things in one!
That was...not what I was expecting.
There wasn't a lot of foreplay there. You got to get people excited first.
Is that the best use of ammunition?
That's a great set you have there! If you, umm, don't mind me saying.
Those look great for cuddling. Can I give it a go?
Magic can do that?! Why is that a spell?
The horny ghost is back! Stay away from me, please!
Big breasts and muscles? You're the hottest girl I've met!
Those are huge! You look so hot!
I ummm, hehehe, wow.
I'm going to take that gun after this game. This is irresponsible and dangerous!
I'm going to destroy that thing if it ruins another great moment. Get out of here!
I used to sneak peeks at the other girls in the Horde showers. That's how I found out I was into girls. This wonderful moment reminded me.
It's finally time! All the rounds leading up to this moment! I'm so excited!
I'd like to dedicate this victory to all cute girls. Especially ~target~.
What was that? She just- I mean her- Her body- She flipped out!!!
Did you just-? Remind me to never go into battle with you!
I like the soft feeling of some hair down there.
I'm going to have a hard time focusing on the rest of the game now.
I have a lot of experience exploring forests. Can I show you?
Nothing in the way. Now that's a perfect view.
It's definitely cleaner to be fully shaven. Plus there's no risk of hair getting into unwanted places. Pretty smart.
I'm trying to look away, but it just keeps pulling me back in. It's so easy to see now.
I love this game!
You look amazing ~target~. I hope you'll still be friends with me after the game.
You call yourself an "adventurer"? The last time I met someone who called himself an adventurer so proudly we ended up with our boat set on fire...
I don't have the best of experiences with people who yell "Adventure!" all the time, but I'll play along.
Here's a tip, ~player~. Never feel intimidated by anyone who owns a cat. It's very likely they spend at least one hour a week on their knees cleaning up a litterbox.
I didn't know there were other people like her... I suppose it makes sense, but I just wasn't expecting to find them here.
This isn't the first time I face the likes of you, ~target~. I don't plan on fighting you, but I will beat you.
... I wonder if she would've gotten along with you...
Card games sure are a great way to unwind, huh? We used to play poker all the time back in the Fright Zone.
I missed playing card games with other soldiers. Don't tell Queen Angela, but the guards at Bright Moon barely qualify as trained soldiers!
~Target~ is the first one out, Sorry, but I'm trying to win here. At least you can still enjoy the game.
I can't tell if you're trying to lose at this point. No one's that unlucky, right?
I'll chip away all the defenses you have ~target~! I've gotten pretty good at that!
Boom! I win!
Did I distract you? I'm not sorry.
Pit, you're one lucky guy.
That's a cool trick! Can you teach me it after the game?
How prepared did you come to this game? How did you even manage that?
You can't put your shoes back on! They came off!
I don't want to see what you look like naked if you can do that!
I guess that's one way of keeping your crotch hidden, but couldn't you have just worn a normal outfit?
Be careful, ~name~, you can't afford another mistake if you want to win this game.
Wait! ~Target~! Well, they left. Now what?
Why didn't you correct me? Now I feel terrible for saying you were a girl this whole time...
Those two are pretty cute together.
I win! You know the rules ~target~.
